about_the_game:
▌Introduction
"LingTian1" is a female-oriented 3D style visual novel game. Players take on the role of an ordinary girl, embarking on a romantic adventure and sweet love story with Prince LingTian of Fang Kingdom.
▌Full Game Version
Over 1000 shots of exquisite dynamic 3D videos
Full voice acting for all characters
You can collect the prince’s heartbeat, warmth, and breath to unlock his different rooms and find clues to solve problems
Unlock 10 interactive sections where the prince calls you, sends you messages, accompanies you, and lulls you to sleep
Main storyline and 10 side stories with different choices leading to different outcomes
Unlock 3 fun mini-games, including sticking patches to the prince
Unlock 10 theme songs
100,000 words of sweet and romantic script adapted from Ginyan's novel


▌Romance
As an ordinary girl, you will experience a romantic adventure with Prince LingTian from Fang Kingdom. All wonderful fates stem from your kind heart. Now, open a magnificent chapter of royal romance filled with love and sweetness!
▌About Fang Kingdom
Fang Kingdom is a new country established after the Third World War. It was founded on a new square-shaped landmass formed by tectonic movements. It is a free, equal, and inclusive country with a blend of multiple ethnicities and languages. Fang people are naturally romantic and passionate about love.


▌The Prince and You
LingTian: Prince of Fang Kingdom, fourth in line to the throne. Tall, handsome, upright, and diligent. The prince fell deeply in love with your kind heart even before the Quest for Love event. He went to great lengths to bring you into Fang Palace, solely to repay you, protect you, and love you.
You: Coming from a poor family, your mother urged you to sign up for the prince's Quest for Love event. You are kind and hardworking, excelling at making braised pork rice. While studying at a culinary academy, you also work part-time at a restaurant. Unaware of the prince's feelings, you find him standing before you in the restaurant, deeply and madly in love with you...


▌Gameplay
-Watch the Story/Make Choices: Enjoy a story like watching a movie and advance your romance with the prince. Collect his smile, heartbeat, warmth, and more to unlock different rooms and find clues to solve puzzles.
-Mini-Games: Solve puzzles by collecting important pieces through mini-games like choosing patches for the prince.
-Daily Interaction and Accompaniment: Interact with the prince through phone calls, messages, and reading his diary.
-Songs and Video Clips: Listen to these songs and review important video clips.



▌Words from Prince LingTian to You
"If we can't be friends, then how about being lovers? I'm asking you seriously, will you be my girlfriend, my princess?"
"I am incredibly grateful to you for saving me, but I don't have any cash on hand to repay you. I only have this large check, please accept it!"



▌Destined Love with 1000 Princes Series
This is a female-oriented romance game series, featuring a highly engaging 3D visual novel style. Players can choose different princes to enter a luxurious and sweet romance. Each app game is named after a different prince. Every prince cares for you, loves you, protects you, supports you, encourages you, and understands you.

"1000 Princes" is a large romantic series for women! It includes a sweet and romantic otome game series and easy-to-understand multilingual learning eBooks.
🍰 "1000 Princes" otome games: Available on STEAM and Google Play
📕 "1000 Princes" multilingual learning eBooks: Available on Google Play
└ 🅿️ "1000 Princes" developer "Ginyan" multilingual learning: On YouTube
🍒 "1000 Princes" theme song music: On YouTube
🌸 "1000 Princes" official website


▌Developer Introduction
Ginyan, I am an independent otome game developer and eBook author, creating foreign language learning books and romance eBooks. I love fantasy and am passionate about learning computers and foreign languages. During the COVID-19 lockdown, I started learning iClone and CC to make 3D animations, as well as the Unity game engine. Later, with various AI tools, I created my first game, "Ling Tian 1," which is adapted from my own romance novel.

name: LingTian1

subs.option_text: 凌天1~妳的命定王子~老公名单系列 - $9.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: LingTian1 is a female-oriented 3D visual novel game. The Prince is madly in love with you. 1000+ shots of exquisite dynamic videos, main line and 10 side lines, Sections for interacting with the prince. Fully Voiced. Theme Songs.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Indonesian, Turkish, Thai, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
